front.title: Cohabitation of the Nicname/Whois Protocol with the CRISP Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a method to allow an Internet registryoperate both a nicname/whois service side-by-side with a CRISPservice in a coherent and well understood manner. This document doesnot attempt to alter the nicname/whois protocol to meet this goal,nor does it attempt to make CRISP backwards-compatible with currentnicname/whois deployments.
